message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its incredible value and potential, I believe a price of $1,500,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe this product has great value, but I'm trying to stay within a certain budget. Would you be willing to consider my offer?

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,100,000 is significantly below my bottom line.  This product offers immense value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,300,000?

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,250,000. Would you be willing to consider my revised offer?
